testcase.name: access to a url protected through a digest authentication
testcase.system-out: * def user = "admin" ...................................................... passed * def password = "admin" .................................................. passed * def get_auth_url = function(fname) { return "http://" + user + ":" + password + "@" + host.replace("http://","") } . passed * def full_url = get_auth_url() ........................................... passed * print full_url .......................................................... passed * def authentication_success_sel = "#content > div > h3" .................. passed Given driver full_url + '/digest_auth' .................................... passed Then match waitFor(authentication_success_sel).text == 'Digest Auth' ...... passed
